summary: The module defines a class that encapsulates operations for handling master degree‑of‑freedom (DOF) records in ANSYS MAPDL, providing methods to create, delete, generate, and list these records as part of the solution workflow.
business_intent: Enable users to programmatically manage master DOF definitions—such as coupling, constraints, or shared DOFs—within MAPDL simulations, streamlining setup and modification of structural analysis models.
